title: Outlaws Of Love
lyrics: Oh, nowhere left to go are we getting c l o s e r - c l o s e r No, all we know is no nights are getting c o l d e r - c o l d e r Hey, tears all fall the same We all feel the rain We can't change Everywhere we go we're looking for the sun Nowhere to grow old, we're always on the run They say we'll rot in hell But I don't think we will They've branded us enough - Outlaws of love Scars make us who we are Hearts and homes are b r o k e n - b r o k e n Far, we could go so far With our mindes wide o p e n - o p e n Hey, tears all fall the same We all feel the rain We can't change Everywhere we go we're looking for the sun Nowhere to grow old, we're always on the run They say we'll rot in hell But I don't think we will They've branded us enough - Outlaws of love Outlaws of love 5x
